H0.text: Electrical charge is surrounded by an electric field that was very useful to speak of when dealing with electrical effects.

H1.text: Liquid charge is what surrounded the electric field when we were dealing with electrical effects, making it useful to speak of.

H2.text: Stellar charge is the object around which an electric field was useful to speak of when dealing with electrical effects.

H3.text: Sunlight charge is the object that is surrounded by an electric field when dealing with electrical effects.

A4.text: An electric field (sometimes called E-field) is a physical field that surrounds electrically charged particles such as electrons.
